Package hrps.control

Class CheckOutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrps.control.CheckOutController
  • public class CheckOutController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller that handles the checking out process, including checking out guest(s), requesting payment and generating the bill(s).
    Author:
    An Ruyi

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CheckOutController getInstance()
        Get the CheckOutController instance. This is to avoid multiple instantiation of controller.
        Returns:
        The singleton RoomController instance.

      • checkOut

        public Bill checkOut​(Room targetRoom,
                     boolean hasPromotion,
                     java.time.LocalDateTime checkOutDate)
              throws InvalidCheckOutTimeException
        Check out guest(s) and the associated check-in reservations from the specified room. Calculate the total price of room and room services and generate the bill.
        Parameters:
        targetRoom - The room to be checked out.
        hasPromotion - true if this bill is valid for promotion, false otherwise.
        checkOutDate - the actual date of check-out that is used to compute the total housing price.
        Returns:
        The Bill containing the details of total amount the guest need to pay.
        Throws:
        InvalidCheckOutTimeException - if the check-out date is before the check-in date.

      • generatePayment

        public Payable generatePayment​(double totalAmount)
        Generate a payment.
        Parameters:
        totalAmount - Total amount needed to be paid.
        Returns:
        An object of a Payable-implementing class, accepted as a payment.

      • generatePayment

        public Payable generatePayment​(double totalAmount,
                               CreditCard creditCard)
        Generate a credit card payment.
        Parameters:
        totalAmount - Total amount needed to be paid.
        creditCard - The credit card used to pay.
        Returns:
        An object of a Payable-implementing class, accepted as a payment.
